soldier is the best profession in almost every scenario

two exceptions are a level filled with very very strong ghosts (go 
clerics!) and a level requiring you to avoid any touch with the enemy
(go archers!)

charge can get you away MAD quick in an open environment, the knives 
are one of the best weapons in melee (oops! i missed! haha no i 
didn't), whirlwind is absolutely SICK at upper levels, ditto for 
boomerang, and disarm is just fun.

Oldschool
